attributes.action: Treat MP's the same way as taxpayers are dealt with by the Inland Revenue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MP's who are guilty of claiming expenses under false pretences should be treated in the same was as the general tax paying public are dealt with by HM Revenue & Customs when they conduct tax enquiries. They have the power to go back 6 years automatically and further if the tax payer is guilty of fraud. The minimum period that should be revisited is therefore 6 years and potentially further. This expenses fiasco amounts to MP's committing fraud against tax payers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
